page.title: 20Kinross Auction Mart
page.content: Beginning as a twice weekly sale of used{vehicles,}this has prospered and expanded to operate a Sunday market serving a large area but has sparked off local controversy. At first locals complained of noise and traffic but,though this was resolved, problems still arise. Local traders have been encouraged to open on Sunday and are well satisfied. (The market is just south of the 12km sq.) -------------------------------------- {CONTRIBUTORS:}K.Thompson MA,PhD;A.Fyfe BSc;M.Amos;H.Cameron;J.Erskine; A.Finlayson;J.Reid;G.Stirling; (text); K.Crichton; J.Gemmell;M.Graham;L.Halkett; H.Ironside;S.Lawrence;D.Marsters; H.Pryde;S.Robertson;E.Smith;W.Wilson; (land cover&amenities);D.Scott, D.Ferris and D.Brackenridge(computer).
